Posts.Content: Well, I started off with 'alternative' treatment after a lumpectomy almost 3 years ago. Wasn't enough for me.... the BC came back with a vengance after 2 years and I'm now just about done with chemotherapy (thank god!) and getting ready for radiation. I still work with the same awesome naturopath that I did from the start, but now it is primarily for supplement regimens. http://www.bouldernatural.com/ I also work with a fabulous acupuncturist/Chinese herbalist who does a ton of work with BC patients. My plan is to go to Sanoviv when all is said and done to detoxify and strengthen my immune system. Thank you for your support! Mindy
